name: Area 52 (Iain Harrison)
description:
Use "W" and "S" to move up and down.

This is a game made by Iain Harrison and Lena Van on the 9th of October 2020 for a self set game a day challenge similar to Inktober.

The game took around 45 minutes to create.

All art was made by Lena Van.

The game was build in unity by Iain Harrison.
